text: Peace for us means the destruction of Israel. We are preparing for an all-out war, a war which will last for generations.
author: Yasser Arafat

text: When we have done our best, we should wait the result in peace.
author: John Lubbock

text: I said peace is sometimes narrowly interpreted it's the absence of conflict between nations or something. But peace is more inherent, more basic to human life, human beings, what we feel about each other, what we feel about life around us and what we see in our future.
author: Muhammad Yunus

text: War makes thieves and peace hangs them.
author: George Herbert

text: There is always a certain peace in being what one is, in being that completely.
author: Ugo Betti
